coreServices.title: A suite of services for all players in the insurance sector
coreServices.subtitle: ClimaVista is designed around three interconnected pillars that transform how insurance industry players manage their exposure and operations.

pillars.title: Business Intelligence Platform & Portfolio Management
pillars.description: Manage and analyze your portfolio, master your exposure and access advanced satellite and climate data.
pillars.focus: Tracking results, commercial campaigns and exposure accumulation.

pillars.title: Parametric Insurance Solutions
pillars.description: Design and implementation of custom parametric insurance products tailored to specific risk profiles of your clients.
pillars.focus: Custom development, easy operation and platform integration.

pillars.title: Early Warning for Extreme Events
pillars.description: Leverage more than 200 weather forecasts updated every 6 hours to anticipate severe events and inform your insured.
pillars.focus: Reduction of claim frequency by informing on Hail, Lightning, Rainfall and Wind.

lifecycle.title: Digitizing the entire insurance policy lifecycle
lifecycle.subtitle: ClimaVista provides an end-to-end workflow for insurers, brokers, reinsurers and public schemes.

steps.label: Pricing & Underwriting
steps.description: Automated policy creation, georeferenced risks, accumulation control and preliminary fraud checks.

steps.label: Policy Creation & Exposure Management
steps.description: Real-time exposure mapping, reinsurance limit monitoring and custom geographic segmentation.

steps.label: Portfolio & Claim Monitoring
steps.description: Track events, claims, adjuster activity and risk evolution throughout the season or policy year.

steps.label: Loss Adjustment & Fraud Detection
steps.description: Verify events using radar, rainfall, frost, drought and satellite damage assessment.

steps.label: Campaign & Portfolio Analysis
steps.description: Analytics on loss ratios, spatial distribution, trends and KPIs for management and reinsurers.
